reviewText: I bought this while visiting the World War II museum in New Orleans (a great museum, incidentally), thus I did not have the benefit of the Amazon web site user opinions.  I thought this program was just "OK".  I was expecting more performance and not as much talking heads commentary.  I also thought that the amount of "Bob Hope" footage was inadequate given the title of the DVD.  What there was of performance was excellent.  I also really enjoyed the historic footage.  The sound was fine.  The video was clear.  Much of it was in black and white -- as should be expected from the World War II era.
Filled with nostalgia and funny moments and routines with losts of nostalgia.  Highlight is a 1980's reunion of Bob and many of performing troop.  Highly recomended!
GREAT PRODUCT .... GREAT PRICE .... SPEEDY DELIVERY!
Gift.  Don't know how well it was received.

Priceless Footage of Bob and his team during WWII and re-living some of the stories of their adventures while entertaining the troops.  Wish this had more historical footage but it was well worth the price
Really well done and even better extras with the interviews after.
Received my order on time. Bob was such a great person/entertainer. Good CD
Not what I was expecting at all!  I thought it would be clips of his shows and instead it's a documentary from some of the folks that went on his tours.  Interesting but not what I wanted to buy.

Interesting and amazing stories about the entertainers who traveled the world to bring a little bit of home to our World War 2 troops.  Loved the ending where Bob Hope and his band of gypsies told their stories.
came very fast - can't wait to see it.
